channel.title: backend on DevNotes 2019
channel.description: Recent content in backend on DevNotes 2019

item.title: Ubuntu 001 Cheatsheet
item.description: ## APT # Update packages apt update, apt update -y # Upgrade all existing packages apt upgrade # Install/remove package apt install curl, which curl, apt remove curl #Search package apt search curl APT GET # Install/remove package apt-get install curl, which curl, apt-get remove curl # Download without install apt-get download curl, ls -lth curl*.deb # Update package list apt-get update

item.title: Backend 001 Headfirst Curl
item.description: General Curl Doc Usage Simple Usage curl -v http://devnotes.tamthapnhilap.site # Get a web page and store in a local file with a specific name: curl -o index.html http://devnotes.tamthapnhilap.site # Get a web page and store in a local file, make the local file get the name of the remote document (if no file name part is specified in the URL, this will fail): curl -O http://devnotes.tamthapnhilap.site/index.html POST (HTTP) curl -d "user=foobar&pass=12345&id=blablabla&ding=submit" http://api.
